member.name: WS_STRING_WINDOWS_INTEGRATED_AUTH_CREDENTIAL
member.summary: Type for supplying a Windows credential as username, password, domain strings.

member.name: WS_STRING_WINDOWS_INTEGRATED_AUTH_CREDENTIAL.credential
member.summary: The base type from which this type and all other Windows Integrated Authentication credential types derive.

member.name: WS_STRING_WINDOWS_INTEGRATED_AUTH_CREDENTIAL.username
member.summary: The username as a string. This must be a valid user. To specify default credentials, use the WS_DEFAULT_WINDOWS_INTEGRATED_AUTH_CREDENTIAL instead.

member.name: WS_STRING_WINDOWS_INTEGRATED_AUTH_CREDENTIAL.password
member.summary: The password for the username as a string. To specify a blank password, the length field of the string must be set to 0.

member.name: WS_STRING_WINDOWS_INTEGRATED_AUTH_CREDENTIAL.domain
member.summary: The domain name or the workgroup name as a string.
